name: ASTROMechanic - Game Jam Edition
description:
Description: ASTROMechanic is a small-scale space exploration game where you collect scrap metal and crystals to repair your space ship that crash landed. Watch for your oxygen and fuel so you don't end up stranded or dead.

Controls:

WASD - Walk Forward/Back, Left/Right

Left/Right + Forward/Back will rotate the character

Space - Jetpack

Q/E - Roll (When far enough from a planet)

R - Head-mount Camera (Useful for lining up with the other planet, will also open while using jetpack.)

Escape - Back to menu

Information:

You win if you successfully collect 40 of each material. Crystals will add more jetpack fuel, and there is only oxygen on the starting planet. If you run out of oxygen, you "die" and are unable to continue. The timer and points are there only to see how fast you can run through the game. Also, the Sun has gravity. It unfortunately does not kill you in this build, but it was planned.

As for judging, audio wasn't implemented in time for the 9 Day Game Jam.
